featured_projects.name: Psych-Ward-Room-Optimization
featured_projects.description: Inpatient psych ward space optimization using linear programming
featured_projects.special_notes: Presented at APA Conference. Optimizes 26-bed psychiatric ward configuration using advanced linear programming techniques.
featured_projects.featured_reason: APA presentation, substantial commit history, healthcare analytics application

featured_projects.name: geo-causal-inference
featured_projects.description: Measuring causal effects of marketing interventions using Time-Based Regression (TBR) with Matched Markets methodology
featured_projects.special_notes: Advanced causal inference for marketing analytics with geographic data integration
featured_projects.featured_reason: Recent project, advanced analytics methodology, substantial size

featured_projects.name: content-pulse

featured_projects.name: EconDash
featured_projects.description: Airflow and PostgreSQL data pipeline for BEA economic data
featured_projects.special_notes: Economic data pipeline with BEA API integration
featured_projects.featured_reason: Modern data engineering stack, production-ready pipeline

featured_projects.name: ethoscope
featured_projects.description: Comprehensive Ethereum network monitoring platform tracking gas prices, MEV activity, and L2 migration patterns with real-time ETL pipeline and predictive analytics
featured_projects.special_notes: Real-time blockchain analytics with TimescaleDB time-series storage, MEV-Boost impact analysis, and ML-powered gas price forecasting
featured_projects.featured_reason: Production-grade blockchain infrastructure, advanced time-series analytics, comprehensive ETL pipeline

featured_projects.name: ope_base
featured_projects.description: Analytics platform for tracking music artist engagement across Twitter, Instagram, and Reddit. Implements bot detection with Isolation Forest, clustering for user segmentation, and trend analysis to optimize content strategy
featured_projects.special_notes: Music industry social analytics: bot detection via Isolation Forest, user clustering for targeted marketing, engagement trend analysis for content optimization
featured_projects.featured_reason: Long-term data collection project, comprehensive analytics platform
